name: Midnight Drifter
description:
Once upon a time, a driver thought it would be cool to make your car go sideways but still keep the control of the car, since then, a whole culture arose. 
There is separate society, with it's own lifestyle, traditions and the way of life, with a special love for the asphalt, burned rubber, the need for speed and the roundabouts. It's the Midnight society, the Drifter's society. It's Midnight Drifter. 

- The biggest range of tuning and upgrade options
- The best way of customization

Build your great performing and best looking car and compete on an online multiplayer server with all your friends. 
- Tournament - Best way to show off who's the boss and to earn some cash so upgrade your car
- Casual - Just hop on and casually put your car sideways along with all hundreds of real people 
- Versus - Go for a battle with a friend or a random person  

Featuring real to life drifting car and the real to life amazing racing tracks, while having best in class visuals and graphics.
